name: The chance at life.
description:
After many months of travelling the Wanderer arrives at the Crypt of Cubes, where the secret of the meaning of life rests.

    Build your own dice with up twelve different options for a side.


  Then roll the dice to create new paths in the dungeon

  Finance your adventure with the many treasures of the dungeon.
 
  And roll the octaedron of destiny to know what should you dedicate your life to. Up to four barely different endings.

  No music for a very deep and philosophical reason that is definitely not because the dev didn't have time to implement it.

For GMTK GameJam 2022.

In game font: "Pixelated" by Greenma201  (http://fontstruct.com/fontstructions/show/426637)
